abstract: A decision by Steven P. Jobs, the chief executive, to take leave puts a spotlight on several executives, in particular Timothy D. Cook, who will take over day-to-day operations.
snippet: A decision by Steven P. Jobs, the chief executive, to take leave puts a spotlight on several executives, in particular Timothy D. Cook, who will take over day-to-day operations.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  For many people, Apple would not be Apple without Steven P. Jobs.

headline.main: A Deep Bench of Leadership at Apple
headline.print_headline: Despite Anxiety Over Leave at Apple, a Deep Bench of Leadership

byline.original: By Miguel Helft and Claire Cain Miller

abstract: European finance ministers promise to support members of the euro zone that are deep in debt, reassuring investors.
snippet: European finance ministers promise to support members of the euro zone that are deep in debt, reassuring investors.
lead_paragraph: Stocks rose on Tuesday, extending a seven-week rally, as gains for commodity producers and a pledge of support by European finance chiefs for the region overshadowed lower-than-estimated profit at Citigroup and the leave of absence by Steven P. Jobs, the chief executive at Apple.

headline.main: Commodities and a Promise in Europe Lift Shares
headline.print_headline: Commodities and a Promise in Europe Lift Shares

abstract: Apple’s shares showed some resilience after an announcement by the chief executive, Steven P. Jobs, that he was taking a medical leave of absence.
snippet: Apple’s shares showed some resilience after an announcement by the chief executive, Steven P. Jobs, that he was taking a medical leave of absence.
lead_paragraph: Apple’s shares showed some resilience on Tuesday after the chief executive, Steven P. Jobs, announced he was taking a medical leave of absence just ahead of the release of the company’s quarterly earnings.

headline.main: Jobs’s Departure Overshadows Apple Earnings Report
headline.print_headline: Ahead of Earnings, Apple Faces Questions About Chief’s Health

abstract: The results far exceeded analysts’ bullish expectations. Even so, they were overshadowed by the decision by Steven P. Jobs, the chief executive, to take a medical leave.
snippet: The results far exceeded analysts’ bullish expectations. Even so, they were overshadowed by the decision by Steven P. Jobs, the chief executive, to take a medical leave.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  The holidays were really good to Apple.

headline.main: Apple’s Strong Holiday Season Lifts Revenue 70%
headline.print_headline: Apple’s Strong Holiday Season Lifts Revenue 70%
